question: [Challenge] English: Identify the slope of the noisy line for the plotted line.

qas.question: [Challenge] English: Identify the slope of the noisy line for the plotted line.
[Rapid] Portugues: Indique the intercept of the noisy line da linha representada.
[Explain] Svenska: Ange the value of y when x equals 1 for linjen i diagrammet.
